title: Spelskandalen
overview: Game and sports fan Bosse from Pite√• embarks on a crazy hunt for the big bucks on racetracks, hockey rinks and soccer fields. A fiend for numbers, Bosse is swept into a world of excitement, high risk, shady bookmakers and stormy conditions in pursuit of the big wins. The gambling scandal is inspired by real events and people in the tangle that shook the sports world in the early 90s.
